summary: The diff only updates project_state.json with pending feature requests; it does not implement any frontend branding/logo or favicon changes required by REQ-1.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the site uses the CCS logo consistently in all primary branding locations by using the generated CCS logo assets in the header navigation brand area, the footer brand block, and the HTML favicon; and ensure all logo elements have English alt text referencing Complete Construction Solutions (CCS).
missing_requirements.reason: No changes were made to any frontend files (e.g., header, footer, or frontend/index.html) or assets; only project_state.json was modified to record the request as pending.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new internal tracking items AR-1 and AR-2 in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks for implementing CCS branding/logo usage; it does not request adding/altering project management metadata or creating new feature-request records.
